scripts.install:
code --install-extension vscode-extension-pack/vscode-extension-pack-0.0.1.vsix && code --install-extension frontend-extension-pack/frontend-extension-pack-0.0.1.vsix && code --install-extension backend-extension-pack/backend-extension-pack-0.0.1.vsix && code --install-extension c-extension-pack/c-extension-pack-0.0.1.vsix &&  echo '
Extension packs are successfully installed.'
